Posts.Content: May 3, 2010 12:08AM summersbluepits wrote: Thanx everyone! We are currently at Cancer Treatment Centers of America in Chicago.  Surgery is on Wednesday. I used a message board when I had preeclampsia and it was sooo helpful, I am hoping my mom will use this board.  I emailed her the link for when we get home, hopefully you will see her on here! She's not thrilled about being out of work, Amy how long were you out of work? How did the chemo affect you?
Posts.Title: My mom was just diagnosed HER2+ IDC hormone negative summersbluepits AmyIsStrong
